overview: Lukas Ridgeston and Johan Paulik star with six other gorgeous guys in this erotic classic from 1996. A day of passion ensues as our boys saturate themselves in sex. Packed with sexual discovery and passion, this third installment in the successful Boy series is a fine example of coming of age erotica and features an amazing collection of Czech guys including the stunning young Stefan Andersen and Johan's tasty piece of brother: Roman Paulik.
title: Boy 3: Boy Wonder
